thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Flying Device (LGI-2019)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Flying Device (LGI-2019) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Flying Device (LGI-2019)
text:
InventHelp, based in Pittsburgh, is submitting the NIGHT KITE to companies for their review and possible feedback.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 23, 2015
"I really enjoy spending extra time with my son. Unfortunately, once the sun goes down, we can't continue our daytime activities," said an inventor from Hicksville, N.Y. "I wanted to be able to continue our hobby into the night, which inspired me to invent this recreational electronic flying device."
He developed THE NIGHT KITE, an electronic flying device designed to be flown both night and day. It is easily visible at night or in low-lighting conditions. The toy promotes family fun and togetherness, and offers hours of entertainment for any age. Additionally, it is easy to control and features an eye-catching design.
The original design was submitted to the Long Island office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-LGI-2019, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://inventhelp.com/about-inventhelp
